channel.title: 码 链 - apricot
channel.description: 每个人眼中，都是不同的世界 –柯宝！!

item.title: Apricot theme for Pelican
item.description:
Apricot is a centered, fixed width, and simple-looking theme, designed from scratch for my personal blog, Pointless Blog of Apricot.

It's not a fork of any themes, not even a copy-and-pasting, but I might have checked up on the official simple theme, when I couldn't figure how what a attribute …
item.dc:creator: ikerbo
